text: 6\. FotoArtFestival exhibition Ruud van Empel during FotoArtFestival 2015 Eikoh Hosoe during FotoArtFestival 2005 Andreas Horvath with his wife Monika Muskala during FAF, 2015 FotoArtFestival is an international art photography biennale organized since 2005 in October in Bielsko-Biała, Poland. It is organized by the Centre of Photography Foundation. It is one of the most important events in the field of photography in Poland. The next edition of the festival is scheduled from 13 to 26 October 2017. == Details == During each festival there are organised several solo exhibitions which last two weeks. The most important day is the Authors' Marathon (the first weekend of the festival), during which most of the authors of the exhibitions talk about their work and experiences. Events accompanying the festival are workshops and a collective exhibition – FotoOpen open to both professionals and amateurs. General Director of the festival is Andrzej Baturo, artist photographer. Program director is Inez Baturo. == References == == External links == * Official website * Photos from FotoArtFestival 2013 Category:Arts festivals in Poland Category:Photography festivals Category:Photography exhibitions Category:Bielsko-Biała Category:Recurring events established in 2005 Category:2005 establishments in Poland Category:Autumn events in Poland
title: FotoArtFestival
